","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1528292000485,"updated":1528292004537,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-47335","entityId":"25-1998260","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47335"},{"name":"summary","value":"Links UI fixes"},{"name":"description","value":"
  • Show links block expanded by default
  • font size: 8px letter-spacing: 0.1 em and make margins and paddings in accordance with the layout
  • Show star and delete only on hover
  • Make hover on resolved issues in a list, as in unresolved.
  • Do not show vote, comment, attachment icons without any votes, comments, and attachments
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1527154249744"},{"name":"updated","value":"1528291906116"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"xi-eye"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Alexander Anisimov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"mitya"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Dmitry Gizatov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"13"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JT-47517","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"JT-47518","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"JT-47519","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"YTB-870","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 68","id":"YouTrack:sprint 68"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image.png","id":"74-529295","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/image.png?file=74-529295&c=true"},{"value":"image1.png","id":"74-532067","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/image1.png?file=74-532067&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2884794","author":"Ekaterina_Zaikina","authorFullName":"Ekaterina Zaikina","issueId":"JT-47335","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1527156951955,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2887438","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-47335","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Show links block expanded by default

It depends on a user profile flag. If you collapse it you will see it next time collapsed.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1527237873199,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2887453","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-47335","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1528204771638,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2902493","author":"Ekaterina_Zaikina","authorFullName":"Ekaterina Zaikina","issueId":"JT-47335","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1528205545014,"updated":1528205590306,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-46630","entityId":"25-1937125","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"46630"},{"name":"summary","value":"TeamCity icon is not shown for builds created by the respective integration"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1523043775686"},{"name":"updated","value":"1528282587020"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Alexander.Volfman"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Alexander Volfman"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Alexander.Volfman"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Alexander Volfman"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-751","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 68","id":"YouTrack:sprint 68"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-46400","entityId":"25-1911775","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"46400"},{"name":"summary","value":"HTML not rendered in workflow.message() method"},{"name":"description","value":"

Prior to 2018.1, one could include at least some HTML as part of the string passed to the message() method. An example of this is in the default "Clone Issue" workflow, which calls message() with a string that includes an HTML link pointing to the new issue. As of 2018.1, this HTML is no longer rendered, yielding raw HTML in the message.

Thinking maybe the format of the messages was changed to Markdown, I tried including a link in the [something](http://something) format, and it, too, got rendered in the raw

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1521838385542"},{"name":"updated","value":"1528266920343"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"hadihariri"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Hadi Hariri"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"bobw"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Bob Williams"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"9"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-751","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Affected versions","value":["2018.1"],"valueId":["2018.1"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 68","id":"YouTrack:sprint 68"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"message-with-markdown1.png","id":"74-506466","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/message-with-markdown1.png?file=74-506466&c=true"},{"value":"message-with-html1.png","id":"74-506467","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/message-with-html1.png?file=74-506467&c=true"},{"value":"image1528266914162.png","id":"74-532335","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/image1528266914162.png?file=74-532335&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2773884","author":"jk","authorFullName":"Evgeny Naumenko","issueId":"JT-46400","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Bob Williams would you mind attaching a screenshot?

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1521894461753,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2780847","author":"bobw","authorFullName":"Bob Williams","issueId":"JT-46400","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Two images are attached. Here's one showing the message when I used markdown:

And one showing the message when I used HTML:

Here are the relevant lines from the workflow that I'm using to generate the message (obviously, I created the two screenshots by alternately uncommenting the message assignment lines):

var message = "This issue has been continued to <a href='" + newIssue.url + "'>" + newIssue.id + "</a>. Don't forget to set the new issue's Release field as appropriate.";
//var message = "This issue has been continued to [" + newIssue.id + "](" + newIssue.url + "). Don't forget to set the new issue's Release field as appropriate.";
workflow.message(message);

And here's similar usage from the default Clone Issue workflow, which (mis)behaves the same way:

var newIssue = ctx.issue.createCopy(); // WARNING! Do not use this method in your workflows. Use Issue#copy() instead
workflow.message(workflow.i18n('A clone of the current issue has been created: <a href="{0}">{1}</a>', newIssue.url, newIssue.id));
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1522167869764,"updated":1522168187019,"permittedGroup":"YouTrack Team","markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2780851","author":"bobw","authorFullName":"Bob Williams","issueId":"JT-46400","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

To be clear, what used to happen prior to 2018.1 is that the HTML link would render as a link, not as raw HTML source. In this case, the issue ID would show without the surrounding markup, and it would be blue underlined text that was clickable.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1522168026276,"updated":1522167869608,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2780873","author":"bobw","authorFullName":"Bob Williams","issueId":"JT-46400","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Re-adding attachments

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1522168277696,"updated":1522168026061,"permittedGroup":"YouTrack Team","markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2796150","author":"Alexander.Volfman","authorFullName":"Alexander Volfman","issueId":"JT-46400","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Bob Williams AFAIU, you see this in experimental issue view mode, is this the case?
The markdown have never been working in these messages, however, if you switch ot classic view, the HTML variant will be rendered just fine.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1522770829146,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2796178","author":"Alexander.Volfman","authorFullName":"Alexander Volfman","issueId":"JT-46400","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
just to make it clear. I'm not suggesting to permanently switch on a classic view, but rather gathering propper STRs.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1522771297524,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2798968","author":"bobw","authorFullName":"Bob Williams","issueId":"JT-46400","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Ah, you are correct. HTML works in classic view, while neither HTML nor markdown work in the new view. Good catch.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1522893049594,"updated":1522168277532,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2801855","author":"Alexander.Volfman","authorFullName":"Alexander Volfman","issueId":"JT-46400","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Markdown has never been supported, as for HTML support on the new issue screen, it will be added within several months.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1523012824468,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2903459","author":"hadihariri","authorFullName":"Hadi Hariri","issueId":"JT-46400","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1528266920346,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"jetbrains-team","markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]},   1. set up flat distribution report, where the distribution field has a range over several 1000 of values
  2. create such report or recalculate it

ER: the report calculates the result and shows the top of it
AR: the report hangs on the stage of result displaying or display it, but hangs on scrolling

Hi!

We've enabled experimental view on our tracker. It's nice and all, but our QAs are not happy with the fact that they need to scroll all the way up to change fields on issue. Also writing a comment can redirect you to the top of the page.
